## Quantile Plots
```{r quantile, fig.height=8}
IV_sub <- summary(LB4L2_final, level = "subject")

quantile_points <- seq(.01,1,length.out = 100)
quantiles_correct <- IV_sub %>%
  filter(final_acc == 1,
         !is.na(RT)) %>%
  group_by(group, practice, OCpractice) %>%
  do(data.frame(probability = quantile_points,
                RT = quantile(.$RT,
                              probs=quantile_points,
                              names=FALSE)
                )
     ) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(cue = ifelse(OCpractice == "N", "Same Cue", "Other Cue"),
         old_practice = practice,
         practice = case_when(.$practice == "S" | .$OCpractice == "S" ~ "S",
                          .$practice == "T" | .$OCpractice == "T" ~ "T",
                          TRUE ~ "N"))

practice_labels <- c(N = "No Practice",
                     S = "Study",
                     T = "Test")

capitalize <- function(string) {
  substr(string, 1, 1) <- toupper(substr(string, 1, 1))
  string
}

ggplot(quantiles_correct,
       aes(x=RT,
           y=probability,
           color = cue)
       ) +
  geom_line(aes(group=cue), size=.75) +
  facet_grid(practice ~ group,
             labeller = labeller(practice = practice_labels,
                                 .default = capitalize)
             ) + 
  scale_color_discrete(name="Practice\nTest Cue") +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = 1:6,
                     limits=c(0,6)) + 
  theme_grey(base_size = 16)
  

```
